## Checklist

- [ ] This PR is the required path for a major feature or substantial behavior change.
- [ ] `README.md` has been updated for any feature added, removed, or substantially changed.
- [ ] If no `README.md` change was required, I documented why in this PR.
- [ ] `docs/pr_summary.md` is updated when behavior changed.
- [ ] No secrets or credentials were committed.
